name: The Ghost Exterminators
description:
Introduction

Survive as long as you can in the haunted dungeon with your shotgun wielding friend. Your friend attempts killing the ghosts with his gun but unfortunately, ghosts can't simply be killed that easily. You must drop potions in front of your friend so that he can destroy the potion pots killing the ghosts. Good luck and survive as long as you can!

Controls MovementWASD keysArrow keysPotion DropSpacebarSpacebar Other mentions

Assets by Pixel_Poem and NYKNCK

Music by z3r0

Hope you enjoy the game folks and happy upcoming Halloween!

-Jonathan
